headline: Entergy Texas declares quarterly dividend on preferred stock
summary: The Entergy Texas, Inc. board of directors has declared a quarterly dividend payment of $0.3359375 per share on its Series A Preferred Stock. The dividend is payable July 15, 2025, to shareholders of record as of July 3, 2025.

raw.headline: Entergy Texas declares quarterly dividend on preferred stock
raw.summary: The Entergy Texas, Inc. board of directors has declared a quarterly dividend payment of $0.3359375 per share on its Series A Preferred Stock. The dividend is payable July 15, 2025, to shareholders of record as of July 3, 2025.
